title: Add OG image dimension validator to metadata-check

title: Enhance robots.txt validator with syntax checking
close_reason: Enhanced checkRobotsTxt with full syntax validation: directive recognition, User-agent ordering, path validation, Sitemap URL check, Crawl-delay validation, AI/LLM bot detection

title: Enhance manifest.json validator with icon/content validation
close_reason: Created manifest-check.js with comprehensive PWA manifest validation: icons existence/sizes, required fields, colors, shortcuts, screenshots, display modes

title: Create print-styles skill for @media print patterns
close_reason: Created comprehensive print-styles skill with @media print patterns, page layout, typography, tables, images, invoices, articles

title: Add dark mode token validator script
close_reason: Created dark-mode-check.js validator that analyzes CSS tokens and reports missing dark mode overrides. Categorizes tokens by type, shows coverage percentage, and provides fix suggestions.

title: Create animation-motion skill for a11y and performance
close_reason: Created comprehensive animation-motion skill covering prefers-reduced-motion, compositor-only properties, transition patterns, keyframe animations, view transitions, micro-interactions, and vestibular trigger avoidance.

title: Add web font validator for font-display and loading
close_reason: Created font-check.js validator that checks @font-face for font-display, modern formats (woff2), deprecated formats (svg/eot), font preload crossorigin, and detects Google Fonts usage.

title: Create service-worker skill with SW linting patterns
close_reason: Created comprehensive service-worker skill covering registration, caching strategies (cache-first, network-first, stale-while-revalidate), offline fallbacks, versioning, common pitfalls, and debugging patterns.

title: Add container queries support to css-architecture skill
close_reason: Added comprehensive container queries section to css-architecture skill with examples, patterns, and updated stylelint config

title: Document CSS logical properties in css-architecture skill
close_reason: Added comprehensive CSS Logical Properties section covering property mappings, common patterns, migration guide, and when to keep physical properties. Updated checklist with 4 new items.

title: Create e2e-testing skill for Playwright/browser testing
close_reason: Created comprehensive e2e-testing skill covering Playwright setup, configuration, locator strategies (role-based preferred), common actions, assertions, waiting strategies, Page Object pattern, accessibility testing with axe-core, and visual regression testing.

title: Add JSON-LD/structured data validator script
close_reason: Created jsonld-check.js with validation for 14 Schema.org types, added npm script lint:jsonld, updated README

title: Add WCAG AAA path documentation and optional config
close_reason: Added comprehensive WCAG AAA section covering contrast requirements, pa11y configuration, AAA-specific criteria, CSS patterns for high contrast, use case guidance, and partial adoption patterns.

title: Add scroll-driven animations to progressive-enhancement skill
close_reason: Added comprehensive scroll-driven animations section covering scroll timeline, animation range values, progress indicators, parallax, sticky header shadow, horizontal scroll, and browser support.

title: Add CSS subgrid patterns to css-architecture skill
close_reason: Added comprehensive CSS Subgrid section covering basic patterns, form alignment, card components, bidirectional subgrid, and named lines.
